description: Test suite for the OllamaTools integration in the agent system, including unit tests for basic functionality, streaming, async operations, memory, response modeling, JSON mode, and history management.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model used for testing structured response content, representing a movie script with title, genre, and plot.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: Helper function to assert that the metrics in the response contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal the sum of input and output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic run functionality of the agent with OllamaTools model.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming responses from the agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Asynchronous test for basic agent run.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the agent's memory capabilities across multiple interactions.

methods.name: test_response_model
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to return structured responses conforming to a Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_json_response_mode
methods.description: Tests the agent's JSON response mode with structured output.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests the history management and message session persistence.
